attributes.action: Housing Associations are charging too much rent from tenants
attributes.additional_details:
For the Government to look at Housing association social housing rental costs for tenants  as many tenants can no longer afford their rent..

There is rental inequality across different properties in the same area- for the government to set a cap on rent.

To make council  and housing association rental affordable to families on a low income. The rents are now often the same as Private rental.
